Name: Giza
Description: Home to the Great Pyramids and the Sphinx, a must-visit for history lovers.

Name: Luxor
Description: Known as the world's greatest open-air museum with temples and tombs.

Name: Tuscany
Description: Famous for Florence, vineyards, and rolling hills, perfect for art and wine tours.

Name: Veneto
Description: Home to Venice, with its iconic canals and historic architecture.

Name: Chiang Mai
Description: A cultural hub with ancient temples and lush mountains.

Name: Phuket
Description: A tropical island with stunning beaches and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Rio de Janeiro
Description: Famous for Copacabana beach and the vibrant Carnival festival.

Name: Amazonas
Description: A gateway to the Amazon rainforest, ideal for eco-tourism.

Name: Kansai
Description: Home to Kyoto and Osaka, rich in temples and modern attractions.

Name: Hokkaido
Description: Known for its ski resorts, hot springs, and natural beauty.

Name: ÃŽle-de-France
Description: The region of Paris, with iconic landmarks like the Louvre and Eiffel Tower.

Name: Provence
Description: Famous for lavender fields and charming villages.

Name: Queensland
Description: Home to the Great Barrier Reef and tropical rainforests.

Name: New South Wales
Description: Features Sydney's Opera House and Bondi Beach.

Name: Marrakech
Description: A vibrant city with bustling souks and historic palaces.

Name: Fes
Description: Known for its ancient medina and traditional craftsmanship.

Name: British Columbia
Description: Offers stunning mountains and coastal adventures in Vancouver.

Name: Alberta
Description: Home to Banff and Jasper National Parks, ideal for outdoor enthusiasts.

Name: Rajasthan
Description: Famous for its royal palaces and desert forts.

Name: Kerala
Description: Known for its serene backwaters and lush greenery.
